hha-meem
wal-kitābi al-mubīni
innā jaʿalnāhu qur'ānan ʿarabiyyan laʿallakum taʿqilūna
wa-innahu fī ummi al-kitābi ladaynā laʿaliyyun ḥakīmun
afanaḍribu ʿankumu al-dhik'ra ṣafḥan an kuntum qawman mus'rifīna
wakam arsalnā min nabiyyin fī al-awalīna
wamā yatīhim min nabiyyin illā kānū bihi yastahziūna
fa-ahlaknā ashadda min'hum baṭshan wamaḍā mathalu al-awalīna
wala-in sa-altahum man khalaqa al-samāwāti wal-arḍa layaqūlunna khalaqahunna al-ʿazīzu al-ʿalīmu
alladhī jaʿala lakumu al-arḍa mahdan wajaʿala lakum fīhā subulan laʿallakum tahtadūna
wa-alladhī nazzala mina al-samāi māan biqadarin fa-ansharnā bihi baldatan maytan kadhālika tukh'rajūna
wa-alladhī khalaqa al-azwāja kullahā wajaʿala lakum mina al-ful'ki wal-anʿāmi mā tarkabūna
litastawū ʿalā ẓuhūrihi thumma tadhkurū niʿ'mata rabbikum idhā is'tawaytum ʿalayhi wataqūlū sub'ḥāna alladhī sakhara lanā hādhā wamā kunnā lahu muq'rinīna
wa-innā ilā rabbinā lamunqalibūna
wajaʿalū lahu min ʿibādihi juz'an inna al-insāna lakafūrun mubīnun
ami ittakhadha mimmā yakhluqu banātin wa-aṣfākum bil-banīna
wa-idhā bushira aḥaduhum bimā ḍaraba lilrraḥmāni mathalan ẓalla wajhuhu mus'waddan wahuwa kaẓīmun
awaman yunasha-u fī al-ḥil'yati wahuwa fī al-khiṣāmi ghayru mubīnin
wajaʿalū al-malāikata alladhīna hum ʿibādu al-raḥmāni ināthan ashahidū khalqahum satuk'tabu shahādatuhum wayus'alūna
waqālū law shāa al-raḥmānu mā ʿabadnāhum mā lahum bidhālika min ʿil'min in hum illā yakhruṣūna
am ātaynāhum kitāban min qablihi fahum bihi mus'tamsikūna
bal qālū innā wajadnā ābāanā ʿalā ummatin wa-innā ʿalā āthārihim muh'tadūna
wakadhālika mā arsalnā min qablika fī qaryatin min nadhīrin illā qāla mut'rafūhā innā wajadnā ābāanā ʿalā ummatin wa-innā ʿalā āthārihim muq'tadūna
qāla awalaw ji'tukum bi-ahdā mimmā wajadttum ʿalayhi ābāakum qālū innā bimā ur'sil'tum bihi kāfirūna
fa-intaqamnā min'hum fa-unẓur kayfa kāna ʿāqibatu al-mukadhibīna
wa-idh qāla ib'rāhīmu li-abīhi waqawmihi innanī barāon mimmā taʿbudūna
illā alladhī faṭaranī fa-innahu sayahdīni
wajaʿalahā kalimatan bāqiyatan fī ʿaqibihi laʿallahum yarjiʿūna
bal mattaʿtu hāulāi waābāahum ḥattā jāahumu al-ḥaqu warasūlun mubīnun
walammā jāahumu al-ḥaqu qālū hādhā siḥ'run wa-innā bihi kāfirūna
waqālū lawlā nuzzila hādhā al-qur'ānu ʿalā rajulin mina al-qaryatayni ʿaẓīmin

ahum yaqsimūna raḥmata rabbika naḥnu qasamnā baynahum maʿīshatahum fī al-ḥayati al-dun'yā warafaʿnā baʿḍahum fawqa baʿḍin darajātin liyattakhidha baʿḍuhum baʿḍan sukh'riyyan waraḥmatu rabbika khayrun mimmā yajmaʿūna
walawlā an yakūna al-nāsu ummatan wāḥidatan lajaʿalnā liman yakfuru bil-raḥmāni libuyūtihim suqufan min fiḍḍatin wamaʿārija ʿalayhā yaẓharūna
walibuyūtihim abwāban wasururan ʿalayhā yattakiūna
wazukh'rufan wa-in kullu dhālika lammā matāʿu al-ḥayati al-dun'yā wal-ākhiratu ʿinda rabbika lil'muttaqīna
waman yaʿshu ʿan dhik'ri al-raḥmāni nuqayyiḍ lahu shayṭānan fahuwa lahu qarīnun
wa-innahum layaṣuddūnahum ʿani al-sabīli wayaḥsabūna annahum muh'tadūna
ḥattā idhā jāanā qāla yālayta baynī wabaynaka buʿ'da al-mashriqayni fabi'sa al-qarīnu
walan yanfaʿakumu al-yawma idh ẓalamtum annakum fī al-ʿadhābi mush'tarikūna
afa-anta tus'miʿu al-ṣuma aw tahdī al-ʿum'ya waman kāna fī ḍalālin mubīnin
fa-immā nadhhabanna bika fa-innā min'hum muntaqimūna
aw nuriyannaka alladhī waʿadnāhum fa-innā ʿalayhim muq'tadirūna
fa-is'tamsik bi-alladhī ūḥiya ilayka innaka ʿalā ṣirāṭin mus'taqīmin
wa-innahu ladhik'run laka waliqawmika wasawfa tus'alūna
wasal man arsalnā min qablika min rusulinā ajaʿalnā min dūni al-raḥmāni ālihatan yuʿ'badūna
walaqad arsalnā mūsā biāyātinā ilā fir'ʿawna wamala-ihi faqāla innī rasūlu rabbi al-ʿālamīna
falammā jāahum biāyātinā idhā hum min'hā yaḍḥakūna
wamā nurīhim min āyatin illā hiya akbaru min ukh'tihā wa-akhadhnāhum bil-ʿadhābi laʿallahum yarjiʿūna
waqālū yāayyuha al-sāḥiru ud'ʿu lanā rabbaka bimā ʿahida ʿindaka innanā lamuh'tadūna
falammā kashafnā ʿanhumu al-ʿadhāba idhā hum yankuthūna
wanādā fir'ʿawnu fī qawmihi qāla yāqawmi alaysa lī mul'ku miṣ'ra wahādhihi al-anhāru tajrī min taḥtī afalā tub'ṣirūna
am anā khayrun min hādhā alladhī huwa mahīnun walā yakādu yubīnu
falawlā ul'qiya ʿalayhi aswiratun min dhahabin aw jāa maʿahu al-malāikatu muq'tarinīna
fa-is'takhaffa qawmahu fa-aṭāʿūhu innahum kānū qawman fāsiqīna
falammā āsafūnā intaqamnā min'hum fa-aghraqnāhum ajmaʿīna
fajaʿalnāhum salafan wamathalan lil'ākhirīna
walammā ḍuriba ub'nu maryama mathalan idhā qawmuka min'hu yaṣiddūna
waqālū aālihatunā khayrun am huwa mā ḍarabūhu laka illā jadalan bal hum qawmun khaṣimūna
in huwa illā ʿabdun anʿamnā ʿalayhi wajaʿalnāhu mathalan libanī is'rāīla
walaw nashāu lajaʿalnā minkum malāikatan fī al-arḍi yakhlufūna
wa-innahu laʿil'mun lilssāʿati falā tamtarunna bihā wa-ittabiʿūni hādhā ṣirāṭun mus'taqīmun
walā yaṣuddannakumu al-shayṭānu innahu lakum ʿaduwwun mubīnun
walammā jāa ʿīsā bil-bayināti qāla qad ji'tukum bil-ḥik'mati wali-ubayyina lakum baʿḍa alladhī takhtalifūna fīhi fa-ittaqū al-laha wa-aṭīʿūni
inna al-laha huwa rabbī warabbukum fa-uʿ'budūhu hādhā ṣirāṭun mus'taqīmun
fa-ikh'talafa al-aḥzābu min baynihim fawaylun lilladhīna ẓalamū min ʿadhābi yawmin alīmin
hal yanẓurūna illā al-sāʿata an tatiyahum baghtatan wahum lā yashʿurūna
al-akhilāu yawma-idhin baʿḍuhum libaʿḍin ʿaduwwun illā al-mutaqīna
yāʿibādi lā khawfun ʿalaykumu al-yawma walā antum taḥzanūna
alladhīna āmanū biāyātinā wakānū mus'limīna
ud'khulū al-janata antum wa-azwājukum tuḥ'barūna
yuṭāfu ʿalayhim biṣiḥāfin min dhahabin wa-akwābin wafīhā mā tashtahīhi al-anfusu wataladhu al-aʿyunu wa-antum fīhā khālidūna
watil'ka al-janatu allatī ūrith'tumūhā bimā kuntum taʿmalūna
lakum fīhā fākihatun kathīratun min'hā takulūna
inna al-muj'rimīna fī ʿadhābi jahannama khālidūna
lā yufattaru ʿanhum wahum fīhi mub'lisūna
wamā ẓalamnāhum walākin kānū humu al-ẓālimīna
wanādaw yāmāliku liyaqḍi ʿalaynā rabbuka qāla innakum mākithūna
laqad ji'nākum bil-ḥaqi walākinna aktharakum lil'ḥaqqi kārihūna
am abramū amran fa-innā mub'rimūna
am yaḥsabūna annā lā nasmaʿu sirrahum wanajwāhum balā warusulunā ladayhim yaktubūna
qul in kāna lilrraḥmāni waladun fa-anā awwalu al-ʿābidīna
sub'ḥāna rabbi al-samāwāti wal-arḍi rabbi al-ʿarshi ʿammā yaṣifūna
fadharhum yakhūḍū wayalʿabū ḥattā yulāqū yawmahumu alladhī yūʿadūna
wahuwa alladhī fī al-samāi ilāhun wafī al-arḍi ilāhun wahuwa al-ḥakīmu al-ʿalīmu
watabāraka alladhī lahu mul'ku al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wamā baynahumā waʿindahu ʿil'mu al-sāʿati wa-ilayhi tur'jaʿūna
walā yamliku alladhīna yadʿūna min dūnihi al-shafāʿata illā man shahida bil-ḥaqi wahum yaʿlamūna
wala-in sa-altahum man khalaqahum layaqūlunna al-lahu fa-annā yu'fakūna
waqīlihi yārabbi inna hāulāi qawmun lā yu'minūna
fa-iṣ'faḥ ʿanhum waqul salāmun fasawfa yaʿlamūna
